text: Having recently switched from a stream each race and each match approach, I've been pleasantly surprised at how lightweight streaming is. While there was enough soccer to justify it, I split my streams by geography, so had separate streams for GB, rest of Europe, Asia and Americas. The 200 market limit seems to apply to the API rather than streams. I did hit a limit on streams but IIRC it was at 1000.

elements.text: Having recently switched from a stream each race and each match approach, I've been pleasantly surprised at how lightweight streaming is. While there was enough soccer to justify it, I split my streams by geography, so had separate streams for GB, rest of Europe, Asia and Americas. The 200 market limit seems to apply to the API rather than streams. I did hit a limit on streams but IIRC it was at 1000.
